extension.summary: Backup and restore LibreELEC system settings and configurations
extension.description: Automatically backup and restore your LibreELEC system settings, configurations, and addons. Supports local and remote storage locations with smart backup rotation.
extension.disclaimer: This addon is not affiliated with LibreELEC or Kodi.
extension.news:

v1.4.1.4 (2026-01-04) - FIX RELEASE - Fixed NFS mounting with nolock option for better compatibility - Fixed SMB browsing path conversion (smb://server/share -> server:/share) - Fixed local backup path handling for NFS mounts - Improved error handling for remote connections
v1.4.1.3 (2026-01-04) - FIX RELEASE - Fixed addon zip structure for proper Kodi installation
v1.4.1.3 (2025-12-30) - TEST RELEASE - Fixed NFS connection and path format handling - Improved SMB browsing with better path validation - Enhanced SFTP error messages and paramiko handling - Settings now auto-save immediately when changed
v1.4.1.2 (2025-12-30) - Fixed restore from backup failing due to read-only file system error - Added automatic mounting/unmounting of addons directory during restore
